panels.title: Node - MAPE & MSE - Metal vs Model

targets.expr:
avg_over_time(
   abs(
       (
        rate(kepler_node_package_joules_total{job='metal', mode='${mode}'}[$__rate_interval]) 
        - on() 
        rate(kepler_node_package_joules_total{job='models', mode='${mode}'}[$__rate_interval])
       )
       / on ()
        rate(kepler_node_package_joules_total{job='metal', mode='${mode}'}[$__rate_interval])
    )[$__range:]
    
) * 100

avg_over_time(
   abs(
       (
        rate(kepler_node_core_joules_total{job='metal', mode='${mode}'}[$__rate_interval]) 
        - on() 
        rate(kepler_node_core_joules_total{job='models', mode='${mode}'}[$__rate_interval])
       )
       / on ()
        rate(kepler_node_core_joules_total{job='metal', mode='${mode}'}[$__rate_interval])
    )[$__range:]
    
) * 100

avg_over_time(
   abs(
       (
        rate(kepler_node_dram_joules_total{job='metal', mode='${mode}'}[$__rate_interval]) 
        - on() 
        rate(kepler_node_dram_joules_total{job='models', mode='${mode}'}[$__rate_interval])
       )
       / on ()
        rate(kepler_node_dram_joules_total{job='metal', mode='${mode}'}[$__rate_interval])
    )[$__range:]
    
) * 100

avg_over_time(
   abs(
       (
        rate(kepler_node_platform_joules_total{job='metal', mode='${mode}'}[$__rate_interval]) 
        - on() 
        rate(kepler_node_platform_joules_total{job='models', mode='${mode}'}[$__rate_interval])
       )
       / on ()
        rate(kepler_node_platform_joules_total{job='metal', mode='${mode}'}[$__rate_interval])
    )[$__range:]
    
) * 100

panels.title: Process ($process) - MAPE & MSE -  Metal vs Model

targets.expr:
avg_over_time(
   abs(
       (
        rate(kepler_process_package_joules_total{job='metal', mode='${mode}', pid='${process}'}[$__rate_interval]) 
        - on() 
        rate(kepler_process_package_joules_total{job='models', mode='${mode}', pid='${process}'}[$__rate_interval])
       )
       / on ()
        rate(kepler_process_package_joules_total{job='metal', mode='${mode}', pid='${process}'}[$__rate_interval])
    )[$__range:]
    
) * 100

avg_over_time(
   abs(

        rate(kepler_process_core_joules_total{job='metal', mode='${mode}', pid='${process}'}[$__rate_interval]) 
        - on()

       )
       / on ()
        rate(kepler_process_core_joules_total{job='metal', mode='${mode}', pid='${process}'}[$__rate_interval])
    )[$__range:]
    
) * 100

avg_over_time(
   abs(
       (
        rate(kepler_process_dram_joules_total{job='metal', mode='${mode}', pid='${process}'}[$__rate_interval]) 
        - on() 
        rate(kepler_process_dram_joules_total{job='models', mode='${mode}', pid='${process}'}[$__rate_interval])
       )
       / on ()
        rate(kepler_process_dram_joules_total{job='metal', mode='${mode}', pid='${process}'}[$__rate_interval])
    )[$__range:]
    
) * 100

avg_over_time(
   abs(
       (
        rate(kepler_process_platform_joules_total{job='metal', mode='${mode}', pid='${process}'}[$__rate_interval]) 
        - on() 
        rate(kepler_process_platform_joules_total{job='models', mode='${mode}', pid='${process}'}[$__rate_interval])
       )
       / on ()
        rate(kepler_process_platform_joules_total{job='metal', mode='${mode}', pid='${process}'}[$__rate_interval])
    )[$__range:]
    
) * 100

avg_over_time(
   abs(
       (
        rate(kepler_process_bpf_cpu_time_ms_total{pid='${process}', job='metal'}[$__rate_interval]) 
        - on() 
        rate(kepler_process_bpf_cpu_time_ms_total{pid='${process}', job='models'}[$__rate_interval]) 
       )
       / on ()
        rate(kepler_process_bpf_cpu_time_ms_total{pid='${process}', job='metal'}[$__rate_interval]) 
    )[$__range:]
    
) * 100

list.description: Mode for Energy Metrics. Can be either dynamic or idle.
list.name: mode
